msbt.message: My phone is ringing.
Hello? That you, ?<10_4 /> Yes, yes, this is Tom Nook! How goes your search for housing land?
I've got some ideas.
It's going great.

Stupendous! I'm relieved to hear that everything is going according to plan.Be sure to check the box in front of the plot for each home. It'll show the items required for that plot. Interior items should be placed in the box, while exterior items should be placed outside around the plot. We want to make it look nice and decorative, now, hm?

Ah, yes! You're going to need a wreath made from flowers as well.There are plenty of beautiful flowers blooming up on the cliffs of .Climb up high and pluck what you need. I've sent you the recipe for making a ladder to get up there.
Once you've set up the plots for all 3 homes and placed the required items, come report back to me!I'll be waiting in Resident Services. Thanks again for your help!
Er, ?<10_4 /> It's me again. Sorry for the repeated calls. I forgot to tell you something important!

You see, you'll need to get a wreath made from flowersThere are plenty of pretty flowers growing up on the cliffs of the island, so tootle up there if you need to!I've already sent you a recipe for a ladder. It's the ideal tool for when you need to scale those cliffs!Anyhoo, keep up the good work, hm?
My phone is ringing.
Hello? ?<10_4 /> This is Tom Nook!
Sorry for the sudden phone call, hm? There's an app I think you should know about.
I know this must seem a little odd since we were just speaking face-to-face a moment ago.Yes, yes, I forgot to tell you about an app I think you should have.
I'll send it to your phone now. Leave the call going and take a look at the screen for me, please.

Wonderful! It finished downloading, hm?<10_4 /> The app I've sent you is the Call Resident app. You can use that app to get in touch with other residents of this island so you can spend time together.
You'll get more details when you use the app to play together. Try it out when you get a chance!
Bye now!
Oh! Tom Nook sent me a new app! Let's see what he says about it

"I've sent the Call Resident app to all the residents of !You can use the app to get in touch with other residents of this island so you can spend time together. You'll get more details when you use the app to play together. Try it out when you get a chance!"
Huh. I really need to try that!

Wonderful!Now, as part of the kit you set up, Lloid will stay and collect donations for the construction fees.
Island residents can contribute little by little. Once we reach our goal, construction will begin!
Of course, you can feel free to make whatever hefty donations you want, .And if you don't make any hefty donations, our goal might never become a reality
Anyhoo All construction donations should go to Lloid. And we'll talk again soon, hm?

Hello? ?<10_4 /> This is Tom Nook!
Sorry for the sudden phone call, hm? There's an app I think you should know about.
I'll send it to your phone now. Leave the call going and take a look at the screen for me, please.

I've just sent you an amazing little app called Island Designer.Developed by Nook Inc., it'll let you get a little more hands-on with the bolder side of island development.At first, you'll only have permission to create paths, but you can redeem your miles for morerobust options. You can unlock different kinds of paths, sure. But you can also alter the cliffs and rivers of the island.Once you get a taste for island designing, I'm sure you'll want to get every permit available!
Well thenenjoy your new app, and have fun creating your ideal island!
